String.string:
Defeat boss monsters 1 time in Lumikan's Trial.

You can use the request 'Attack Lumikan's Catalepticon' in Vanguard Requests (shortcut 'H') to teleport to Highwatch. Talk to Anke, the Ace Dungeon Instructor, to enter the Ace Dungeon.

You can only enter the dungeon once you've spoken to Anke and chosen a test exercise.
